12.titel: Mastering Flame Surfing for Fall Damage Prevention
12.text:
Escape fall damage by harnessing the power of falling flames through ingenious tactics.

1. Equip Molotov cocktails or fire shells to create a cascade of falling flames.

2. Locate a suitable building or cave ledge to initiate the falling flames.

3. Time your jump to land on the descending flames, effectively turning them into a temporary surf platform.

4. Safely ride the flames to the ground, skillfully avoiding any potential fall damage.
